Class AppPublics.LoadingBroadcastListener

java.lang.Object
  com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.AppPublics.LoadingBroadcastListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppPublics.BroadcastListener
Enclosing class:
AppPublics
public abstract static class AppPublics.LoadingBroadcastListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements AppPublics.BroadcastListener

A broadcast listener which listens only to AppPublics.UI_LOAD_ACTION intents.

Since:
2010.02.04

Method Detail

broadcastLoading

public static void broadcastLoading(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.lang.Class<? extends android.app.Activity> targetActivityClass,
                                    boolean isLoading,
                                    boolean addCategory)
Triggers a loading event through a broadcast intent action.

Parameters:
context - the context which will be used to trigger the event
targetActivityClass - the class which should receive the loading event
isLoading - whether this deals with a loading which starts or stop
addCategory - whether the broadcast intent should contain the target category

getActivity

protected final android.app.Activity getActivity()

getIntentFilter

public android.content.IntentFilter getIntentFilter()
Description copied from interface: AppPublics.BroadcastListener
This method will be invoked by the framework to determine what IntentFilter should be associated to the current listener.

Specified by:
getIntentFilter in interface AppPublics.BroadcastListener
Returns:
if not null, only the intents that match with this returned value, will be received by the activity

onReceive

Description copied from interface: AppPublics.BroadcastListener
Is invoked every time an intent that matches is received by the underlying activity.

Specified by:
onReceive in interface AppPublics.BroadcastListener

onLoading

protected abstract void onLoading(boolean isLoading)
Is invoked when a new loading event (intent) occurs.

Parameters:
isLoading - is equal to true if and only if the underlying activity is not loading anymore
